about_section.title: Your Gateway to Study Abroad, Global Research & Scholarship Opportunities
about_section.description: At EduMatch, we bring students closer to graduate research programs and scholarships worldwide, ensuring a perfect fit with our intelligent matching system. Explore opportunities that align with your academic background and aspirations.

features_1.title: Smart Matching
features_1.description: Match students with the right programs based on qualifications.

hero.description: Select a plan that fits your scholarship hunting needs. From basic search to AI-powered matching, we've got you covered.

free.name: Free Plan
free.description: Ideal for applicants ready to apply and track progress.

Send messages to scholarship staff / professors

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s

questions.question: What is included in the Free Plan?
questions.answer: The Free Plan includes basic account registration, profile creation, scholarship search, and viewing details. Perfect for getting started with EduMatch.

questions.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

questions.question: What makes the Premium Plan worth it?
questions.answer: The Premium Plan includes advanced AI matching, unlimited applications, natural language search, and priority customer support for serious scholarship hunters.

questions.question: Do you offer refunds?
questions.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you are not satisfied, contact our support team for a full refund.

header.title: Support Center
header.subtitle: Get help using the EduMatch platform, find answers to frequently asked questions, and contact our support team for personalized assistance.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have an issue not covered in the FAQs? You can ask us a question here, and we'll get back to you to help.
contact.note: You can attach files to help us better understand your issue. Supported formats: PNG, JPEG (max 5MB), PDF, DOC, DOCX (max 10MB).

account.question: How do I create an EduMatch account?
account.answer: Click the "Sign Up" button on the homepage, fill in your information including email, password, and basic profile information. You'll receive a verification email to activate your account.

account.question: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
account.answer: Click "Forgot Password" on the login page, enter your email address, and we'll send you a password reset link. Follow the instructions in the email to create a new password.

account.question: How can I update my profile information?
account.answer: Navigate to the Profile section after logging in. You can edit your personal information, academic background, research interests, and upload documents.

account.question: Can I delete my account?
account.answer: Yes, you can delete your account by going to Account Settings and clicking "Delete Account". Note that this action is irreversible and all your data will be permanently removed.

application.question: How do I apply for scholarships and research opportunities?
application.answer: Navigate to the Explore section, filter by your preferences, and click on any opportunity you're interested in. Each listing has detailed application instructions and required documents.

application.question: Can I apply to multiple opportunities at once?
application.answer: Yes, you can apply to as many opportunities as you're eligible for. We recommend tailoring each application to the specific requirements.

application.question: How do I track my application status?
application.answer: Visit your profile dashboard where you can view all submitted applications, their current status, and any updates from the institutions.

application.question: What documents do I need for applications?
application.answer: Common documents include CV/Resume, transcripts, letters of recommendation, personal statements, and research proposals. Each opportunity specifies its exact requirements.

subscription.question: What subscription plans are available?
subscription.answer: We offer Basic (free), Premium, and Professional subscription plans. Each plan provides different levels of access to opportunities, application tracking, and premium features.

subscription.question: How do I upgrade my subscription?
subscription.answer: Go to Account Settings and click "Subscription". Select your desired plan and complete the payment process. Your upgrade will be activated immediately.

subscription.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
subscription.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your Account Settings. Your premium features will remain active until the end of your current billing cycle.

subscription.question: Do you offer refunds?
subscription.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for new subscriptions. Contact our support team within 30 days of purchase for a full refund.

other.question: How does the matching algorithm work?
other.answer: Our algorithm analyzes your academic background, research interests, location preferences, and career goals to match you with the most suitable opportunities.

other.question: Is my personal information secure?
other.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your data. We never share your personal information with third parties without your consent.

other.question: How do I contact support?
other.answer: You can reach our support team via email, phone, or live chat. We also have an extensive help center with articles and tutorials.

other.question: Do you have a mobile app?
other.answer: Currently, EduMatch is available as a mobile-optimized web application. We're working on native mobile apps that will be available soon.

role_selection.title: Choose your role
role_selection.subtitle: Select whether you're looking for educational opportunities or representing an educational institution.

applicant.title: Applicant
applicant.description: I'm a student or professional looking for educational opportunities, courses, or programs.

institution.title: Institution
institution.description: I represent a school, university, or educational organization offering programs and courses.

basic_info.title: Basic information
basic_info.subtitle: Please provide your basic personal information to create your profile.

profile_photo.label: Profile Photo
profile_photo.requirements: Must be PNG, JPG, or WebP file (max 10MB)

email.label: Email
email.tooltip: Email is pre-filled from your account and cannot be changed

phone.label: Phone Number
phone.min_length: Phone number must be at least 7 digits

interests.label: Interest
interests.error: Failed to load disciplines. Please refresh the page.

errors.invalid_file: Please select a PNG or JPG image file
errors.file_requirements: Must be PNG or JPG file (max 5MB)

cv.label: CV / Resume
cv.tooltip: Upload CV/Resume in PDF, DOC, DOCX format (max 10MB). Required: Personal info, education, work experience, skills, contact details. Must be a CV/Resume, not a cover letter or personal statement.

language_cert.label: Foreign Language Certificate
language_cert.tooltip: Upload language certificates in PDF, JPG, or PNG format (max 10MB). Required: Test name (IELTS/TOEFL/etc.), test scores, test date, candidate name and info, issuing organization logo/seal. Must be official certificates, not practice tests.

degree.label: Degree Certificate
degree.tooltip: Upload degree/diploma certificates in PDF, JPG, or PNG format (max 10MB). Required: Degree type (Bachelor's, Master's, PhD), field of study, institution name, graduation date, student name, official status (seal/signature/stamp). Must be a certificate, not transcript.

transcript.label: Academic Transcript
transcript.tooltip: Upload academic transcripts in PDF, JPG, or PNG format (max 10MB). Required: List of courses/subjects, grades for each course, academic periods/terms, overall GPA (if applicable), student name and ID, institution name. Must show detailed course and grade information.

files.label: Research Paper Files
files.tooltip: Upload formal academic research papers in PDF format (max 10MB per file). Required: Clear title, author name(s) and affiliation, abstract, structured sections (Introduction, Methods, Results, Conclusion), references with citations, academic writing style. Must be formal research papers, not blog posts or essays.

errors.message: Failed to upload files. Please try again.
errors.research_paper_upload_failed: Failed to upload research paper files. Please try again.

profile_logo.label: Institution Logo
profile_logo.requirements: Must be PNG or JPG file (max 5MB)

email.label: Institution Email
email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address
email.tooltip: Institution email is pre-filled from your Google account and cannot be changed

email.label: Representative Email
email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

about_institution.label: About Institution
about_institution.placeholder: Describe your institution, its mission, programs, and what makes it unique...

errors.invalid_file: Please select a PNG or JPG image file
errors.file_too_large: File size must be less than 5MB

institution_details.title: Institution Details
institution_details.subtitle: Select disciplines and upload verification documents

verification_documents.label: Verification Documents
verification_documents.tooltip: Upload institution verification documents in PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, or PNG format (max 10MB per file). Required: Institution name and official details, registration numbers or accreditation information, official letterhead/logo/seal/certification marks, statement of legal status/authorization/recognition, contact information. Must be formal verification documents, not brochures.
verification_documents.error: Please upload at least one verification document to continue.

completion.title: Profile Complete!
completion.subtitle: Your profile has been successfully created. You can now start using EduMatch.
